about_the_game:
Robot Fury is a mech combat simulator where you can feel like a true robot warrior. Fight enemies with a powerful flamethrower, soar into battle with your jetpack, and finish off foes with precise machine gun headshots. Customize your mech and engage in exhilarating, epic battles!

About Robot Fury

Robot Fury is an exhilarating mech combat simulator that puts you in the cockpit of powerful, customizable robots. Experience the thrill of mechanized warfare as you engage in fierce battles using an array of weaponry, including flamethrowers, machine guns, and rocket launchers. Soar into combat with your jetpack and execute precise attacks to dominate your enemies.

Key Features

The game offers a variety of missions and challenges, allowing you to test your combat skills and tactical decisions. Customize your mech to suit your playstyle, upgrade its weapons, and adapt its abilities to tackle different threats. With intense combat scenarios and dynamic environments, Robot Fury delivers a gripping and immersive experience where every battle is a chance to prove your prowess as a top mech pilot!

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of shooting, explosions, and violence involved in the game, as it's fully focused on intense robot combats. However, there is no blood or bad language involved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Video Card with DX11 support, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
